channel.title: Shops
channel.description: I know this sounds nooby, But How do i make a shop and put items in it? lol :P

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

Go to item.cfg, search for the item (There aren’t any spaces allowed so if you are searching for let’s say dragon dagger you have to say dragon_dagger) You will see many numbers after it, the second number over is the shop price.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @Frostedyounub Frostedyounub
item.description:
@Frostedyounub wrote:

how do i change prices on the items?

Read full topic

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

Depends on what source you have, I’m going to assume that you are using Delta. First go into client.java and find

 if (NPCID == 553) {
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 2; // Aubury rune shop
}

Wanneshop is the shop number, and the if you want to change the NPC change the NPC ID number.

Now spawn your NPC, you should be able to do this in the autospawn.cfg file.
Example:

spawn = 553	3091	3487	0	0	0	0	0	1	Aubury

Then go to shops.cfg and you just put something like this

shop = 2	Runes Store				2	2	4151	5

This is saying at the shop number 2, give it the name “Runes Store”, yes it sells, yes it buys, put 5 whips in it (Whip ID is 4151)

Read full topic
